lines.text: that the strong take away from the weak, and the smart take it away from the strong.
This is the only law that I know is worth a hoot in this part of the country. The only law.
In the end, I'll see that the law gets you. And it won't be just to run you out of town. It'll be at the end of a rope.
You go right ahead and build your town and attract settlers.
So you can take away their money at faro and roulette, eh?
Yeah, that's the idea. You take care of their virtues, I'll take care of their vices. Simple, ain't it?
Jim... what are you going to do?
I've got a date with McCord!
Now listen son, I know just how you feel...
Well then in that case you won't hold me up with a lotta talk, will you?
I haven't done anything! Except kill a lotta ki-yotes in self defense... if you wanna put it in law talk.
Hunted, hiding... The Kid continued to play his cards the way he saw them... and by his own rules.
Pop is counting on you to bringing law and order in this territory, Judge.
That's going to be some job, judging from the scum of the west I've seen drifting in here.
